official-title.#text:
To terminate the National Flood Insurance Program and

		  purposes.

text.#text:
The amendments made by this section shall take effect at the
			 end of December 31, 2015.

header.#text:
Interstate compacts
			 for flood insurance coverage

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is hereby given to any two or more States to enter into agreement or
			 compacts, not in conflict with any law of the United States, for making
			 available to interested persons insurance coverage against loss resulting from
			 physical damage to or loss of real property or personal property related
			 thereto arising from any flood occurring in the United States.

text.#text:
The right to alter, amend, or repeal this section, or
			 consent granted by this section, is expressly reserved to the
